user.title: Room HVAC Setup
user.description: Select the climate entities for air conditioning and floor heating. Both entities must be different climate devices with required capabilities.

behavior.title: Behavior Options
behavior.description:
Configure global behavior settings for the Room HVAC integration.

**Force Control Mode:** When enabled, the integration will prevent external changes to the unified entity and enforce strict control consistency.

ac_presets.title: AC Preset Configuration
ac_presets.description:
Configure up to 4 presets for air conditioning modes. Each preset requires a name and fan speed. Unconfigured slots will be ignored.

**Note:** Each preset maps a name to a specific fan speed. Only configured presets will be available.

fh_presets.title: Floor Heating Preset Configuration
fh_presets.description:
Configure up to 4 presets for heating mode. Each preset requires a name and target temperature. Temperatures will be validated against your floor heating's min/max range. Unconfigured slots will be ignored.

**Note:** Each preset maps a name to a target temperature.

confirm.title: Confirm Configuration
